block.p: PANDOLFO--Elizabeth, on June 15, 2007. Beloved wife of Gary. Dear sister of Nancy and Jimmy. Wonderful sisterin-law of John and Diane. Cherished aunt of Cristin, Meghan, Siobhan, James, Christian and Elena. Family will receive friends at the Flynn Memorial Home, 1652 Central Park Ave., Yonkers on Monday 2-4 and 7-9pm. A Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated at St. Eugene's Church, Yonkers, on Tuesday at 10 AM. Interment at St. Mary's Cemetery, Yonkers.
